item.description:
These events are getting bigger and better each month.
Lots of friendly people, having a great time on the dance floor, and some just chatting.
The music is great for dancing and we do try to mix it up a little.
The July 11th dance is downstairs in the big ballroom, with a great receiving area, for those who want to escape to a quieter area.

Large room & dance floor / Great finger foods / Super music / Lots of new faces
$10 cover at the door.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask, you can't miss me.
item.name: Summertime in the City! Dance Party.
